title: Judge Not
description: Matt is gay, but has given up love rather than accept it. Hiding from himself as well as the rest of the world, he works hard and goes home alone. Until one night he doesn't make it home. He steps into the underworld of the Earl's Court where he will be punished for his mistakesâ€”and maybe get a second chance. (M/M, Short Story - 4880 words.)
author: Kailin Morgan
